name: Insecure Buyer
description:
Hi there!

Welcome to Insecure Buyer this is a game teaching YOU the player about the importance of smart buying choices. Of course, this is based on the fact that not everyone can buy everything on their grocery list. In addition, just for the sake of actually experiencing this issue I made it into an interactive game. The main premise involves YOU buying groceries with a very tight budget make sure you buy them all and always go for the cheapest!

WEBGL Version:
Hey there you lovely player as you may have noticed the WEBGL version is for mainly those who want to give the browser version a try (despite the fact its more of a downgrade) there's a lot less animation in this one since WEBGL cant support MP4's but its the same experience so have fun shopping!
